name: Web Template E-Commerce
description: The Web Template E Commerce App is a comprehensive full-stack application developed as the capstone project for Super Bootcamp Jawa Barat 2024. It integrates Go and MySQL on the backend with a frontend crafted using NextJS and styled with Tailwind CSS. The application is deployed on Vercel, ensuring seamless performance and scalability

be_keypoints.description: Developed CRUD operations for Product and Category management,

Enhanced the product search experience by implementing query parameters (e.g., category ID, product name, minimum price, maximum price) in the "Get All Products" endpoint, enabling filtering and pagination,
Integrated role-based protection using JWT middleware to secure data-modifying endpoints, ensuring server-side security,
Implemented a feature to add and remove product Â©ikes (pending frontend integration),

Utilized stored procedures for operations involving multiple table modifications, instead of handling them with transactions in Go code. This approach improves code clarity, reduces network traffic, and enhances round-trip response times by processing statements in a single call.

fe_keypoints.description: Created a products page with integrated product filtering functionality,
Seamlessly integrated the search input in the navbar with product filtering, utilizing Zustand for state management,
Connected the product details page with the API for dynamic content,
Developed product management features for the admin dashboard.

name: Bike Review App
description: Bike Review is a full-stack web application developed as a React-based task during Superbootcamp Jawa Barat 2024. The backend is powered by Go and Supabase, while the frontend is crafted using ReactJS, with Tailwind CSS for styling and DaisyUI to accelerate the design process.

name: E-Clinic
description: E-Clinic is a clinic management system API built using Go. This project was created during final project of the Go bootcamp at Enigmacamp. Implements clean architecture, the program can perform CRUD operations and Authorization using JWT.

name: Portofolio Web App
description: The Portfolio Web App is a frontend application built with Vue.js, featuring client-side routing powered by Vue Router. It integrates with Formspree to handle messages from visitors. The app is hosted on Firebase for serving static files and deployed to GitHub Pages.

name: Moonwalker
description: Moonwalker is 2D platformer infinite runner game built using Unity Engine. This game was created during Pizza Jam submission on Itch.io

name: Pie In The Sky
description: Pie In The Sky is a 2D casual game made with Unity. This game is based on coding challenge made by Daniel Shiffman from The Coding Train. Challenge link: https://thecodingtrain.com/challenges/169-pi-in-the-sky

name: Throw Boll
description: Throw Boll is a hyper-casual game created using the Unity engine. This game implements authentication and a leaderboard system using Firebase, ads using AdMob, and in-app purchases using Unity's built-in IAP package.

name: Tetorisu
description: Tetorisu is a casual puzzle game derived from the classic Tetris. Developed with the Unity Engine, this game features a leaderboard system implemented using PlayFab and includes ads via AdMob.

name: Night Fishing
description: Night Fishing is a 2D idle fishing game made with the Unity Engine. It utilizes the Unity Universal Render Pipeline to implement night visual effects and lighting.
